pkgmetadata.longdescription: # InOrbit CLIWelcome to the InOrbit Command Line Interface.## Installing[https://pypi.org/project/inorbit-cli/](https://pypi.org/project/inorbit-cli/)Make sure you deactivated the development virtual environment or you are using a different one with no `inorbit` python package installed.```bashpip install inorbit-cli```## UsageThe CLI requires an API key for authenticating against InOrbit's platform. For obtaining it, please go to the [InOrbit developer console](https://console.inorbit.ai/).```bash$ export INORBIT_CLI_API_KEY="company_api_key" $ inorbit --helpUsage: inorbit [OPTIONS] COMMAND [ARGS]... InOrbit Command Line Interface tool The InOrbit CLI tool enable roboteers to interact with the InOrbit Cloud platform in order to manage robot configuration as code.Options: --help Show this message and exit.Commands: describe get```## ContributingSee [CONTRIBUTING.md](./CONTRIBUTING.md)
